ygData.messageBody:
---
On Thu, 1 Jul 1999 15:45:13 Sirenia wrote:
>From: "Sirenia" <paladin@...>
>Anyway, I think having a guild with many of us on the same server would be a great idea. I would be willing to leave my guild and server if there is enough interest in starting one up on a new server.


Well, we seem to have a lot of people on Tunare. Maybe we *should* make a rainbow guild?

btw, I'll soon be lvl 18. Would you like to adventure with a shaman?

Shalka
